divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for my father outside a mechanic shop. I looked at the horizonand i saw a saucer shaped object on the horizon. It came from my left stoppeddirectly in front of me and stopped for a second and sped off to my right. Ifelt happy because i had finally seen a UFO.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Paterson
There were no other sightings in Paterson on or around August 24th 2003
